is an exciting place
to be.We create

Point Of

About

                 Riad Mammadov is a pianist and composer with a deep passion for both classical and contemporary music, as well as a dedicated explorer and ambassador of Mugham and Jazz Mugham.

Services

Born and raised in

Baku, Riad received

an European education at

Moscow Tchaikovsky

Conservatory, so his

life and work flow

between two cultures.

The East and the

West have always

been connected in

his music, creating a

deep philosophical

dialogue that has

lasted for centuries.
